news.description:
The celebrations continue! The Entity has extended the Gilded Stampede event by an extra week.

Celebrate the Year of the Ox in Dead by Daylight with the Gilded Stampede celebration.

From February 11th - March 4th, the Fog will be transformed into a vibrant celebration full of fireworks and colorful lanterns in honor of the Lunar New Year.

For a limited time, the Gilded Stampede celebration features a Lunar New Year themed lobby, themed Generators and Hooks, as well as the return of the Chinese Firecracker Item and Red Envelope Offering.

The celebration also introduces the Festive Toolbox, a brand-new item for Survivors. Packed to the brim with fireworks, it's prepared to celebrate all your life's successes... and failures.

Enter the Fog during the celebration to redeem 50,000 Bloodpoints per day - that's a total of 700,000 Bloodpoints to earn if you log in every day throughout the Gilded Stampede celebration. With the extension, there are now 7 extra days of 50,000 Bloodpoints, for a total of 1,050,000 Bloodpoints to be earned.

Keep an eye on the Dead by Daylight social channels and the in-game news throughout the celebration for special promo codes to unlock some free Gilded Stampede Collection items.

For more information about the Lunar New Year in Dead by Daylight: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/lunar-new-year-2021
news.title: GILDED STAMPEDE EXTENDED

news.title: GILDED STAMPEDE EXTENDED

news.description:
Level II of Tome VI is now available! With it comes the below:
  • 20 Challenges (incl. 8 Master Challenges & 1 Glyph Challenge)
  • 8 Memory and Log Entries (including the final entry for THE NURSE'S " The Cleansing of Crotus Prenn" )
  • More Bloodpoints


    • To access Level II, you must have reached the Epilogue node of Level I with either role.
news.title: THE CLEANSING OF CROTUS PRENN

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 4.5.2 bugfix.

CONTENT
  • Raised camera to original position when crawling
  • Changed transition animations in Survivor Locomotion to make the controls feel more responsive.
  • HUD Layout changes: Added a new setting in the Settings menu to control the size of the Skill Check independently of the HUD scale setting.


    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed hit registration issues seen since 4.5.0
  • Fixed an issue that caused survivors to crawl faster than intended
  • Fixed an issue that prevented event bloodpoints from being awarded from certain indoor generator types
  • Fixed an issue with Killers unable to view charms on hooks


    • Please click HERE for full patch notes.
news.title: 4.5.2 BUGFIX

news.title: 4.5.2 BUGFIX

  • Crotus Penn Asylum

news.title: REALMS RE-ENABLED

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 4.5.1 bugfix.

BUG FIXES
  • Fixed various collision-related issues in Autohaven Wreckers and Crotus Penn Asylum
  • Fixed an issue where pips lost or gained in a Custom Match only fixed after a following Public Match was played
  • Fixed an issue that caused various error messages to occur in a lobby or after a trial after specific conditions were met
  • Fixed an issue where a spectator could be sometimes locked in the spectator screen when entering in spectator mode while the last Survivor reaches the tally screen
  • Archives: Fixed Glyph placement issues in Gideon Meat Plant, Sanctum of Wrath, The Pale Rose, Midwich Elementary School, and both Asylum maps


    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • Killers are unable to view charms on hooks in game


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 4.5.1 BUGFIX

news.title: 4.5.1 BUGFIX

Celebrate the Year of the Ox with us and enjoy discounts on outfits from the past Lunar New Year events!

The Moonrise and Scarlet Swarm collections are available at up to 30% OFF:

  • Ace Visconti's Seasoned Gambler Outfit
  • The Huntress' Brave Beast Outfit

    • The sale starts on February 12th and ends on February 18th. Learn more about the Lunar New Year Event here: deadbydaylight.com/en/news/lunar-new-year-2021

news.description:
Tome VI: DIVERGENCE is now open within The Archives, bringing new stories to discover in the world of Dead by Daylight. DIVERGENCE contains brand-new Glyph Challenges, new stories, and new rewards. Explore the memories of Yui Kimura, The Nurse, and The Observer, all while earning memorable outfits and cosmetics.

Level Release Schedule
  • Level I: February 10th 2021 11AM ET
  • Level II: February 24th 2021 11AM ET
  • Level III: March 10th 2021 11AM ET
  • Level IV: March 31st 2021 11AM ET


    • Please note these release dates are subject to change. All previously unlocked levels will remain available once released but will stop providing Rift Fragments once the relevant Rift has expired.

    LIMITED TIME SALE - 50% off Auric Cells price for Yui Kimura and The Oni, between February 10th 11AM ET and February 17th 11AM ET.
news.title: Archives Tome VI - DIVERGENCE

news.description:
Tome VI: DIVERGENCE is now open within The Archives, bringing new stories to discover in the world of Dead by Daylight. DIVERGENCE contains brand-new Glyph Challenges, new stories, and new rewards. Explore the memories of Yui Kimura, The Nurse, and The Observer, all while earning memorable outfits and cosmetics.

Dive deeper into Tome VI's characters with the Tome Reveal Trailer (https://youtu.be/5WbM1Q25d-g) & Rift Trailer (https://youtu.be/J6tQ8dfeD5A).

Level Release Schedule

  • Level II: February 24th 2021 11AM ET
  • Level III: March 10th 2021 11AM ET
  • Level IV: March 31st 2021 11AM ET


    • Please note these release dates are subject to change. All previously unlocked levels will remain available once released but will stop providing Rift Fragments once the relevant Rift has expired.

news.title: Archives Tome VI - DIVERGENCE

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 18.5! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

CONTENT
  • Tome VI for The Archives will start tomorrow on Feb. 10th at 11AM ET
  • The Gilded Stampede event will start the day after on Feb. 11th at 11AM ET
  • New HUD Layout - Several HUD elements have been moved or updated
    • Clown Gameplay Update
  • Clown now has two types of bottles: Tonic and Antidote.
  • Reload time is now 3 seconds (down from 5 seconds)
    • Live Balance
  • Killers: The Trapper (Escape attempt success rate) & The Wraith (Invisibility distance)
    • Visual Update
  • Visual updates to maps (Gideon Meat Plant, Disturbed Ward & Father Campbell's Chapel), models & textures (The Nurse & The Clown)
  • Updated Survivor Locomotion & Self-Heal fail animation, added hatch animation, raised the camera when crawling
    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • Some tutorial and UI texts show incorrect characters in Thai language on Steam.
news.title: CHAPTER 18.5 PATCH NOTES

news.description:
The Dead by Daylight team would like your feedback in a Player Satisfaction survey.

We encourage you to be as honest as possible in letting us know how you feel about the game. The information and answers provided are anonymous, not shared with any third-party, and will not be used for purposes other than survey analysis.

Access the survey HERE: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/DbD-PSATn
news.title: PLAYER SATISFACTION SURVEY

news.description:
HAPPY NEW YEAR, PEOPLE OF THE FOG!
To celebrate the new year, select outfits are available at discounts up to 75% off!
Make sure to grab that outfit you've always wanted! Offer ends January 11th 11AM ET, so hurry up and head to the Store!

20% OFF
  • The Executioner's Forge Born outfit, now 960 AC
  • Cheryl Mason's Lisa Garland outfit, now 1320 AC
  • Feng Min's Happy-Go-Lucky outfit, now 960 AC
  • Dwight Fairfield's Mr. Elf outfit, now 960 AC
  • Meg Thomas's End of Semester outfit, now 960 AC
  • Kate Denson's Midnight Rider outfit, now 960 AC


    • 35% OFF
  • The Blight's Sophisticated Slaughter outfit, now 780 AC
  • Claudette Morel's Chalet Getaway outfit, now 780 AC
  • Jake Park's Woodworker outfit, now 780 AC
  • The Spirit's Furious Nyx outfit, now 780 AC
  • Jeff Johansen's Into the Sunset outfit, now 780 AC


    • 50% OFF
  • The Clown's Carnie Claws outfit, now 600 AC
  • The Huntress's Solstice Devotee outfit, now 600 AC
  • Nea Karlsson's Reckless Boarder outfit, now 600 AC
  • David King's Hard Man outfit, now 600 AC
  • The Deathslinger's Double-Crossed outfit, now 600 AC


    • 75% OFF
  • The Oni's Ice-Cold Legacy outfit, now 300 AC
  • The Hillbilly's Pyromania outfit, now 300 AC
  • The Wraith's Wax Warlock outfit, now 300 AC
  • Zarina Kassir's Guerilla Filmmaker outfit, now 300 AC
  • Yui Kimura's Snow Motocross outfit, now 300 AC
  • David King's Riot Guuuy outfit, now 300 AC
news.title: UP TO 75% OFF ON SELECT OUTFITS

news.description:
The Rift for Tome V will close on January 6th!

For those without a Rift Pass, this will be the last chance to unlock it and claim any rewards you've earned on the Premium track.

Once the Rift closes the below will come into effect:
  • Challenges, Entries, and Bloodpoints from Tome V will remain available permanently after this date but no longer award Rift Fragments. Once the next Tome begins, Tome V will be available in the Compendium section.
  • Player Level XP will stop awarding Rift Fragments.
  • Unclaimed rewards from the Rift will be automatically claimed on your next launch of the game or tally screen, whichever comes first.


    • Stay tuned for Tome VI to arrive with Mid-Chapter 18.5!
news.title: RIFT CLOSES IN 1 WEEK

news.description:
Ring in 2021 and the conclusion of our Advent Calendar 2020 with the New Year '21 Universal Charm, after The Blight finds his vision frozen over with a pair of Frosty Eyes.

Note that the 100,000 Bloodpoints gift available between Dec. 31st and January 3rd is only claimable once.

Cosmetics
  • Dec. 28th 11AM ET - Dec. 31st 11AM ET: The Blight's Frosty Eyes*
    • Code: FROSTYBLIGHT
  • Dec. 31st 11AM ET - Jan. 3rd 11AM ET: New Year '21 Charm*
    • Code: NEWYEARNEWENTITY

    Login Currencies
  • Dec. 28th 11AM ET - Dec. 29th 11AM ET: 500 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 29th 11AM ET - Dec. 30th 11AM ET: 10,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 30th 11AM ET - Dec. 31st 11AM ET: 500 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 31st 11AM ET - Jan. 3rd 11AM ET: 100,000 Bloodpoints (claimable once)


    • For more information on the Advent Calendar 2020 Event, check out our blog post https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/advent-calendar-2020

    "Have a fantastic holiday season and a bloody good new year"
    -The Dead by Daylight Team

    *Redeemable only once per user. Code will only be active for the specified period. To redeem, enter the Store and click "Redeem Code" at the top right. All Ugly Sweaters will be available via the in-game Store at a later date.
news.title: ADVENT CALENDAR 2020 - WEEK 5

news.description: Due to a bug found with the "Buried Underground" challenge in Tome 5 Level 4, we have replaced it with "Gruesome" (Hook 20 Survivors)
news.title: TOME 5 UPDATE

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 4.4.2 bugfix.

BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue on multiple maps, where there are tiles with extremely bright lighting in various colors
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Flashlight to work inconsistently over pallets and other objects in the environment
  • Fixed an issue that caused Barbecue & Chili's bonus bloodpoints not to be granted when controlling Victor when the game ends
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Twins not to recover their add-ons when using the Black Ward offering and controlling Victor when the game ends
  • Fixed an issue that caused the cooldown animation to loop after returning to Charlotte
  • Fixed an issue that caused Victor to float off Charlotte's body after respawning
  • Fixed an issue that caused Victor and Charlotte to be able to block off exit gate by standing in front of it


    • BALANCE
  • Victor can now be recalled after being detached from Charlotte for 30 seconds (down from 45)


    • Please click https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 4.4.2 BUGFIX

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 4.4.2 bugfix.

BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue on multiple maps, where there are tiles with extremely bright lighting in various colors
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Flashlight to work inconsistently over pallets and other objects in the environment
  • Fixed an issue that caused Barbecue & Chili's bonus bloodpoints not to be granted when controlling Victor when the game ends
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Twins not to recover their add-ons when using the Black Ward offering and controlling Victor when the game ends
  • Fixed an issue that caused the cooldown animation to loop after returning to Charlotte
  • Fixed an issue that caused Victor to float off Charlotte's body after respawning
  • Fixed an issue that caused Victor and Charlotte to be able to block off exit gate by standing in front of it


    • BALANCE
  • Victor can now be recalled after being detached from Charlotte for 30 seconds (down from 45)


    • Please click HERE for full patch notes.
news.title: 4.4.2 BUGFIX

news.description:
In regards to Error 111/112, we apologize that this error is affecting some of our players and can assure you it is receiving our attention.

Rest assured the team is putting all their effort into finding a proper solution.

As compensation for the inconvenience, we have awarded 300,000 Bloodpoints to all players upon login from today until Jan 3rd 12AM ET. Apologies for the situation, and thank you for your patience.
news.title: ERROR 111/112 UPDATE

news.description:

    Each week and its gifts will be revealed on Mondays at 11AM ET. Be sure to check back every day!

    *Redeemable only once per user. Code will only be active for the specified period. To redeem, enter the Store and click "Redeem Code" at the top right. All Ugly Sweaters will be available via the in-game Store at a later date.
news.title: ADVENT CALENDAR 2020 - WEEK 3

news.description:
Make sure to pick up Elodie's Pathfinder's Sweater, perfect for a girl fixated on her goal, wherever it takes her! Community outfits also arrive to the in-game Store while the Deathslinger feels a chill in the air with his Frosty Eyes.

Cosmetics
  • Dec. 14th 11AM ET: Community outfits now available via in-game Store for Iridescent Shards
    • Incl. Feng Min's Demon Slayer & The Clown's Mr. Puddles
  • Dec. 15th 11AM ET - Dec. 18th 11AM ET: The Deathslinger's Frosty Eyes*
    • Code: FROSTYDEATH
  • Dec. 18th 11AM ET - Dec. 21st 11AM ET: Elodie's Pathfinder's Sweater*
    • Code: PATHFINDER

    Login Currencies
  • Dec. 14th 11AM ET - Dec. 15th 11AM ET: 1,000 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 15th 11AM ET - Dec. 21st 11AM ET: 10,000 Bloodpoints (per day)


    • For more information on the Advent Calendar 2020 Event, check out our blog post HERE!

    Each week and its gifts will be revealed on Mondays at 11AM ET. Be sure to check back every day!

    *Redeemable only once per user. Code will only be active for the specified period. To redeem, enter the Store and click "Redeem Code" at the top right. All Ugly Sweaters will be available via the in-game Store at a later date.
news.title: ADVENT CALENDAR 2020 - WEEK 3

news.description:
Two exciting community outfits have made their way to the store!

Available now in the Community Collection:
  • The Clown - Mr. Puddles Set (Design inspired by Kangyaku)
  • Feng Min - Demon Slayer Outfit (Design inspired by Agus Alvi)


    • Check out the Collection Trailer HERE
news.title: COMMUNITY COLLECTION

news.description:
The Tome V Rift has now been extended by a full week!

New Tome V Rift End Date: January 6th 11AM ET

As an added bonus and in the spirit of the season, use the Redeem Code "GIFTTHERIFT"* for 20 free Rift Fragments towards your Tome V Rift progression!

Enjoy the holidays, and stay safe!

* To redeem, enter the Store and click "Redeem Code" at the top-right. Usable once per player. Expires December 18th 11AM ET.
news.title: TOME V RIFT EXTENSION

news.description:
Keep warm and enjoy some holiday festivities!

Available in the store:
  • Claudette Morel - Claudette Claus Outfit
  • Jake Park - Winter Comfort Outfit

    • Check out the Collection Trailer HERE
news.title: CLAUDETTE & JAKE - HOLIDAY HORROR

news.description:
Level IV of Tome V is now available! With it comes the below:
  • 20 Challenges (incl. 6 Master Challenges)
  • 6 Memory and Log Entries (including the final entries for The Observer's Logs in "Sanitus Alonis")
  • More Bloodpoints


    • To access Level IV, you must have reached the Epilogue node of Level III with either role.
news.title: THE OBSERVER'S "SANITUS ALONIS"

news.description:
Celebrate the season in style!

Available in the store:
  • Dwight Fairfield - Dwight-in-a-Box Outfit
  • Ace Visconti - Winter Wisecracks Outfit
  • Zarina Kassir - Penguin Onesie Set

    • Check out the Collection Trailer HERE
news.title: DWIGHT, ACE & ZARINA - HOLIDAY HORROR

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 4.4.1 bugfix.

FEATURES
  • Increased default Flashlight accuracy back to normal
  • Appraisal now only allows Survivors to rummage through the same chest once
  • Ebony and Ivory Memento Moris now require the targeted survivor to have been hooked twice
  • Victor can now search lockers, if a Survivor is found inside, the player will be send back to control Charlotte while Victor will block the Survivor in the locker for up to 10 sec.


    • CONTENT
  • Hoarder: Increased the distance at which Survivor locations are revealed from 24/36/48 meters to 32/48/64 meters
  • Hoarder: Removed the stipulation that it decreases the rarity of items found in chests


    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue that allowed Victor to pounce on Survivors inside lockers
  • Fixed an issue that could cause Unbreakable to grant too much recovery when spam clicking
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Flashlight beam to stay narrow after successfully blinding the Killer
  • Fixed an issue that prevented Hoarder from spawning extra chests
  • Fixed an issue where Victor was misaligned during the Twins mori
  • Fixed an issue that caused Victor to get stuck in the ground when released at certain locations.
  • Fixed an issue that allowed survivors to crawl out of the exit gate after being hit while having Victor on their back.


    • Please see https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for detailed patch notes.
news.title: 4.4.1 BUGFIX

news.title: 4.4.1 BUGFIX

news.title: Hit Validation Disabled

news.description:
'tis the season of giving in Dead by Daylight!

Let's celebrate the holidays & end of 2020 together with free cosmetics and currencies!

Stop by every day for new gifts, and every Monday at 11AM ET for that week's schedule of gifts!

Now let's kick off December in style with Zarina's Snap Snap Sweater and the Killer's Stocking Charm, filled with blood-stained weaponry for all the vicious boys and girls.

Cosmetics
  • Dec. 1st 11AM ET - Dec. 4th 11AM ET: Killer's Stocking Charm*
    • Code: NAUGHTYSTOCKING
  • Dec. 4th 11AM ET - Dec. 7th 11AM ET: Zarina's Snap Snap Sweater*
    • Code: SNAPSNAP

    Login Currencies
  • Dec. 1st 11AM ET - Dec. 2nd 11AM ET: 10,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 2nd 11AM ET - Dec. 3rd 11AM ET: 1000 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 3 11AM ET - Dec. 6th 11AM ET: 10,000 Bloodpoints (per day)


    • For more information on the Advent Calendar 2020 Event, check out our blog post https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/advent-calendar-2020

    Be sure to also keep an eye out on our social channels and Fog Whisperers for some Rare Charm goodies!

    *Redeemable only once per user. Code will only be active for the specified period. To redeem, enter the Store and click "Redeem Code" at the top right. All Ugly Sweaters will be available via the in-game Store at a later date.
news.title: ADVENT CALENDAR 2020 - WEEK 1

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 18: A Binding of Kin. Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find.

For a full list of patch notes, https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

FEATURES & CONTENT
New Characters
  • Added A New Killer - The Twins
  • Added a New Survivor - Élodie Rakoto

    • Visual Update
  • Visual updates to maps in Ormond and Junkyard. (Appearance rate increased for these maps for this week)
  • Visual update to the Hatch and Totem.
  • Visual update on the Twins Lobby.


    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue that caused daily rituals to be consumed even if the claim of bloodpoints for a completed daily ritual failed.
  • Fixed an issue that caused a short freeze when opening a chest.
  • Fixed an issue that prevented survivors from being able to start unlocking a chest from its side.
  • Fixed an issue that caused firecrackers not to destroy Hag traps.
  • Fixed an issue that sometimes caused killers to be stuck inside a generator after damaging it.
  • Fixed an issue that caused survivors to be able to see through walls when using a flashlight and hugging the wall.
  • Fixed an issue which made exclusive cosmetics available to all


    • KNOWN ISSUES

    The Twins
  • Victor may become stuck if he pounces on a locker with a healthy Survivor inside. Charlotte will be unable to search the locker until Victor is recalled.

    • The Twins' perks
  • Coup de Grace: Missing visual feedback when performing a modified lunge attack

    • Élodie's Perks
  • Appraisal: Survivors keep rummaging through the chest for a brief moment after the action is completed
  • Power Struggle: The perk can't be used while actively wiggling
news.title: Chapter 18 Patch Notes

news.description:
Our past can sometimes be a burden that drives us to the most dangerous places in search of answers and hope. But when hope is nowhere to be found, compulsion and rage fill in the void, for better or for worse...

The Twins - Charlotte and Victor Deshayes - formed an emotional bond like none other. After a life of hardship and suffering, The Entity has twisted their love for one another into something truly terrifying. The new Survivor is Élodie Rakoto. Cunning, smart, and resolute, Élodie spent her life trying to uncover the mystery of her parents' disappearance. Grief-stricken and guilt-ridden, she turned to the occult to find the answers she was looking for.

A Binding of Kin includes:
  • A new Killer: The Twins
  • A new Survivor: Élodie Rakoto
  • An exclusive item for Élodie


    • Hunt as a deadly pair with The Twins... or fight to survive as the unwavering and determined Élodie Rakoto with the A Binding of Kin Chapter in Dead by Daylight.

    Please note that there will be a delay between the A Binding of Kin characters being available via our in-game store and the full DLC package. Should you purchase a single character via our store; you will not receive the DLC exclusive item. We also remind you that in-game store purchases are non-refundable.
news.title: A Binding of Kin Chapter Release

news.description:
During a frigid winter, The Twins are stalking their victim, dressed in a fresh kill.

Available in the store:
  • The Twins - Blood & Guts Outfit
  • Élodie Rakoto - Reindeer Onesie Set


    • Check out the Collection Trailer HERE
news.title: THE TWINS & ÉLODIE - HOLIDAY HORROR

news.description:
ACT FAST, PEOPLE OF THE FOG!

For one week only, all characters and a selection of outfits are available at discounted prices!
  • 50% OFF all characters released before the Descend Beyond Chapter
  • 20% OFF The Blight and Felix Richter
  • 30% OFF all store outfits released before the Descend Beyond Chapter


    • Make sure you grab your favorite Survivors, Killers and outfits before this deal ends!

    Offer ends December 3rd 11AM ET

    Discount limited to characters and outfits purchased in Auric Cells
news.title: UP TO <font color="#FFD700">50% OFF</font> OUTFITS & CHARACTERS

news.description:
This weekend, Bloodlust will be temporarily disabled on the live version of the game.

Why?
In order to better understand the effect Bloodlust has on the game in 2020, we will be disabling the mechanic on PC & consoles for the course of this weekend. This will allow us to gather feedback and data on Bloodlust and see what kind of effect it has on matches in a real-world scenario.

When?
November 20, 11 a.m. ET: Bloodlust is disabled

November 23, 11 a.m. ET: Bloodlust is re-enabled

Disclaimer
This test only disables the Bloodlust mechanic. References to Bloodlust will still appear in the game, and Beast of Prey will not activate as a result.
news.title: Bloodlust Experiment

news.description:
Level III of Tome V is now available! With it comes the below:
  • 20 Challenges (incl. 9 Master Challenges)
  • 9 Memory and Log Entries (including the final entry for The Hillbilly's "A Man Named Boy")
  • More Bloodpoints


    • To access Level III, you must have reached the Epilogue node of Level II with either role.
news.title: THE HILLBILLY'S "A MAN NAMED BOY"
